offerSource.offerHeaderDescription: Would you like to add extras to your trip?

clubDayPassOffer.offerDescription: Relax and recharge in a peaceful hideaway.
descriptions: Receive access to any United Club location and enjoy complimentary amenities such as:
- Beverage including select beer, wine and spirits
Each pass allows one person one-time access
termsAndConditions: - One-time passes are valid for one year from the date purchased when purchased through the app
- One-time passes purchased at a United Club location must be used at time of purchase
- United Club pass grants one person one-time access to a United Club℠ location
- Access is subject to space availability; see which United Club locations are open here united.com/UnitedClubLocations
- Same-day boarding pass on United, Star Alliance™ or a contracted partner operated flight is required for entry into all United Club locations
- Passes may not be sold, bartered, traded, exchanged or purchased
- Offer subject to change or cancellation without notice
- All United Club Terms and Conditions apply united.com/UnitedClubRules
